aboutus.ourgoaldesc: Our main goal of the system is to act as a bridge of communication between businesses and charity  organization, and allow users to donate food and they can reach out to each other and help out the people who are in need.
aboutus.ourmissiondesc: Our mission is to help out people in need, we are trying to serve those who are in need with necessary food supplies, through charity organizations.
aboutus.ourvaluedesc: The greatest benefit of a donation is of helping the needy people around. Nowadays there are lots of people who need help in life in all aspects especially various essential things, by helping them to live in a unique way which is means by providing them the most important thing which is food.

sponser.ourpartnerdesc: Working with our partner. A strong network. We have formed alliances

donationsection.descmilk: This is where we put the description of the donation products that are available to be donated or are requested to be given, this gives a breif idea as to what is the product and what is used for its benifits or the manfacturing company

header.desc: The Food Donation WebApp is an online platform that works as a bridge to connect restaurants, food-supplier companies and  Supermarkets to organization.

profilecard.desc1: The main issues to solve are achieving food security, and hunger improving the food nutrition.

adddonation.title: Title
adddonation.avalible: How many days the food will be available?
